Jason Scanzoni
Product Manager - Startup Engineer

Portfolio

About

Jason is a product manager who is able to jump in and get his hands dirty when necessary. He can:

  • manage a software team
  • hack at code
  • wireframe
  • manage the story backlog
  • produce marketing materials
  • interface with customers
  • meet with executives/other departments
  • run QA testing

Jason is interested in software startups, education technology (ed-tech), digital agencies, and innovative tech companies.

With a special mix of technical abiliy, entrepreneurial spirit, and creativity, Jason is interested in software startups, education technology (ed-tech), digital agencies, and innovative tech companies.

Cherry Picker

Cherry Picker is a sales and marketing tool which prioritize and generate a predictable stream of leads. Developed as an internal tool to generate leads for OpenWater, but the tool had the capability to generate leads for other markets.
